channel.title: Adding links to JFrame?
channel.description: How can I add links to JFrame? It already has one to rune-serber and I want one to Moparscape. I tried just adding another link same as rune-serber just changed name and link to ave both but i get errors

item.title: Adding links to JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

I am taking into consideration YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR BUTTON SETUP

Here is how to make the button go to a url:

Go to your GUi.java look for

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase(

Add into that area this:

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("WhatButtonSays"))
{
launchURL("URLGOESHERE");
log("Loading website...");
}

NOTE: This is a Bluurr client setup, idk what type of client you are using.

Read full topic
